info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bladen, central Robeson and northwestern Columbus Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boardman, or 10 miles southeast of Lumberton, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding of water may briefly affect low lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Pembroke, Fairmont, St. Pauls, Rowland, Boardman, Howellsville, Butters, Hestertown, Barnesville, Buie, Robeson Community College, Barker Ten Mile, Purvis, Evergreen, Elrod, Rex, Rennert, Proctorville and Mcdonald. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 3 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
